title: Early Sales
body: So I'm wondering when the early sales are cause in January it started in the 20's and now February it hasn't come out yet so is it always going to be a late monthly sale cause changing the name might be better. The March sale schedule has already came out and I still want February skins.

replies.body:
Hey!

Right now the sales will be over the course of a weekend sometime in the month. So February sales will be this weekend or next.
